metadata.title: Wednesday, 9th March, 2022
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) when the Zombe Border Post in Mbala District will become operational; and
(b) what the cause of the delay in operationalising the Border Post is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to promote production of rice at a commercial level in Nchubula area in Kanchibiya Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) what the specific measures in the plan, are.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate township roads in Mpongwe District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the following infrastructure in Isoka Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Isoka Police Station; and (ii) houses for police officers at Isoka Police Station; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the tarring of the M18 road from Lufwanyama to the Kasempa-Solwezi road will commence;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the project is;
(c) what the total cost of the project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport and Logistics when the pontoon at the confluence of the Luangwa and Zambezi Rivers in Feira Parliamentary Constituency will become operational.
Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the rehabilitation of the following roads in Kafue Parliamentary Constituency has stalled:
(i) Shantumbu; and (ii) C7 - Chanyanya;
(b) when the projects will resume; and
(c) what the time frame for the completion of each project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the following infrastructure in Chasefu District:
(i) Chasefu - Chikwa road; and (ii) Luwelezi Bridge on Chasefu-Chikwa road; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented. __________________________
